RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager

RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager Class Reference

#include <guimanager.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The Gui Manager used by the client.

This singleton class is used to create GUI forms.

Definition at line 49 of file guimanager.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::createNumDebugWindow ( Ogre::RenderWindow *  win  ) 

Create a GUI overlay wich shows fps and primitives count.

The window shows the minimum, maximum ans actual number of fps (frame per second) and drawn primitives

Parameters:
win The Ogre window that receive the debug window

Definition at line 88 of file guimanager.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::showFPS (  ) 

Actualize the window created with createNumDebugWindow().

The values are taken from the Irrlicht Driver getFPS() and getPrimitiveCountDrawn() functions. We also manage the minimum and maximum values of fps and primitives.

Definition at line 123 of file guimanager.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::GuiManager::loadCEGUILayout ( const char *  layoutName  ) 

Loads a CEGUI layout and shows it.

Typically, the file may be in the /rpg/data/gui/layout directory. The extension of the file is layout.

Parameters:
layoutName The name of the layout file to load
